tasks.label: ValgrindBuild
tasks.command: meson build --buildtype=debug --prefix=/usr/lib/lv2 && sudo ninja -C build install && valgrind lv2apply -i ~/Music/noise.wav -o ~/Music/denoised.wav https://github.com/lucianodato/noise-repellent

tasks.label: InstallPlugin
tasks.command: meson build --buildtype=release --prefix=/usr/lib/lv2 && sudo ninja -C build install

tasks.label: InstallDependencies
tasks.command: sudo apt install build-essential gdb valgrind meson ninja-build git lv2-dev libfftw3-dev sordi lilv-utils
